summary: "Iron Man 2" is a 2010 superhero movie about Tony Stark (Iron Man) resisting the government's demand to share his tech, while a Russian scientist, Ivan Vanko, uses similar technology to seek revenge on the Starks. It's the third film in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. The movie was made after the success of the first "Iron Man" and stars Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, and new cast members like Mickey Rourke. Filming took place in California and Monaco. The movie made lots of money but got mixed reviews. A third "Iron Man" movie came out in 2013.
title: Iron Man 2
